caption.p: Bar graph and pie chart for cases and deaths. Shown are laboratory-confirmed cases and deaths in China and the rest of the world due to SARS-CoV-2. (A) SARS-CoV-2 confirmed cases in the top five affected countries from each WHO designated region, where maximum casualties were reported to WHO until 13 May 2020. (B) Total numbers of deaths and cases in China only. (C) Total number of cases worldwide by region.
